description: A man appears in court charged with the grooming and sexual assault of a 12-year-old girl in Rotherham.
title: Sheffield man charged with Rotherham grooming offences
title_page: Sheffield man charged with Rotherham grooming offences - BBC News
maintext:
On a quest to get home, a night of fun becomes a dangerous battle...
Celebs welcome Alison Hammond for a sleepover
